name: Sistem Manajemen Keuangan - Mie Ayam Baso Sadulur
description: Modern MSME Financial Management System Complete platform for managing MSME finance, inventory and business analysis with interactive dashboards and real-time reports.
longDescription: financial management system specially designed for culinary MSMEs. This platform combines digital financial recording, inventory management, menu analysis, and KPI dashboards in one modern, easy-to-use application equipped with a landing page/company profile.
